text:
Traffic in Bangalore,
Consider flying to work now,
Sky is clear for all.

My tunes on repeat,
It's time for me to be DJ,
Have you heard this one?

Sunny day is here,
Time for some golf on the green,
Let's do one more run.

It's that time of year,
Caps are flying in the air,
I have graduated.

Feeling hungry now,
Let's have some hot food served up,
It is time to eat.
